description.p: **NOTE: This wrapper is not verified by, affiliated with, or supported by MikroTik.**

WinBox is a small utility that allows the administration of MikroTik RouterOS using a fast and simple GUI. All WinBox interface functions are as close as possible mirroring the console functions, that is why there are no WinBox sections in the manual.
